title: Forbidden Fate
description: I only had one rule: don’t fall in love with the cruel prince.I broke it.When the clock struck twelve, I went back to being a servant. He promised to let me go with my heart in pieces...but Grayson Crowne always was king at breaking promises.I refuse to let him lock me in a tower.I have no choice but to take the only out offered me—another cruel prince.Refuge in a man I loathe.Rescued from the man I love.I wanted to forget Grayson, forget Crowne Hall, and hide, however fate has other plans.But if Grayson and I are fated, then our fate is forbidden.Our happily ever after will only end one way...in heartbreak.Forbidden Fate is the third book in the Crowne Point universe. You need to have read Stolen Soulmate to read Forbidden Fate.
author: Mary Catherine Gebhard
